properties.name: robert.protocol.hello-message-timestamp-tolerance
properties.description: Timestamp tolerance for Hello Messages in seconds

properties.name: robert.server.request-time-delta-tolerance
properties.description: Requests time delta tolerance in seconds

properties.name: robert.server.status-request-minimum-epoch-gap
properties.description: Minimum number of epoch between two Status Requests

properties.name: robert.protocol.epoch-bundle-duration
properties.description: Number of seconds in a day / duration of an epoch in seconds * number of days for which to generates bundle

properties.name: robert.server.captcha-challenge-timestamp-tolerance
properties.description: Timestamp tolerance for the Captcha Challenge in seconds

properties.name: robert.server.time-start
properties.description: Time start of Robert Server with format YYYYMMDD
